Blog.post: Put on your Busch Gardens Game Face... Cause here we come! Heehee... Enric is coming out to visit me again coming up here July 4th... and we are gonna go to Busch Gardens again! YAY! fun fun fun! And he was even able to ask his Pappy for the day off!!! YAY! more time is always good... BTW, the "No Trespassing" on OUR gazeebo... We'll just have to ignore that! hehe! ;) XOXOXOXOXOXO i'll see you soon! ::kiss::

you know what? if you come and see me... youre not gonna be able to get away... because youre gonna be ALL MINE! :) ;) :) i miss you.... seeing you was like a tease... you got me addicted to you, and now i need you back! *^*^*^*^*^*^*^*^*^*^* So what are we going to do about it!? .... what are you going to do, when youre here and i make you all mine!? you won't be able to go back to WPB!!! muahahahaha! lol... hehe... jk... but still... i miss you... and i need you... here... now... asap... hurry.... like... now! ;) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Haha i loved that note!!!!! :) ~Enric xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo

Oh my god! i miss you so much! soon ok? SOON! i would post a pic of us together but i don't know how haha... you can do it maybe tomorrow! :) "I remember bank of america being here...." "funny funny funny!" haha :P muah!!
Enric... Needs to come and visit me this weekend... truly you do! ;) Muwah~ ~Courtney
All he does at work.... *Enjoy his BIG comfy couch. *Watch movies.... *and MTV.... *and TV Shows.... *EVERYTHING TV!!! (lol) *Bolt *Hot or not... (ooo baby your smokin'!) :~* ::muwah::

6/3/2004 1:30:31 PM lol nah! haha... your funny baby! i am so tired... but its cool cuz my day is going by so fast!!! sooon... it will be five and i can leave!!! YAYA ! i think i might drive out to see you tonite for a few minutes! lol! three hours! yah, its worth it! hehe ;) or to me at least! ::xoxoxoxoxoxo:: 6/3/2004 1:20:43 PM aw, really??? not me... i guess my arms are too hairy haha 6/3/2004 12:44:58 PM Well, that doesn't mean that we can't go back! We just have to be slick ... smooth ... undercover ... duh duh duh! lol! 007 -- Sean Connery! lol! We should sneak away from work and see eachotehr! hehe... im so bad! ;) 6/3/2004 12:23:08 PM yo know what i also loved??? when you bit my shoulder... oh my god .. i got the goosebumps when you did that!!! oh, and can't forget the massaging my scalp 6/3/2004 12:20:46 PM Can't forget the back pocket ! I put it there for when my hand gets tired... i don't have to worry about it getting me into trouble... plus... PINCH PINCH! heehee ;) "Funny Funny Funny!" 6/3/2004 12:05:40 PM i miss you pinching my ass while holding onto my belt!! hehe _____________________________ ---------Som el millors!!!------- Visca el barça i abaix els galàctics!!!

urlLink Teeter Toot's Blog A day in my office, is pretty slow. Except for the occassional fired up customers wondering where the hell their parts are at...why we haven't come out yet... etc. ... etc.... Need I explain more... pretty boring. I spend most of my day "secretly" talking to Enric online and over the phone... boredom only goes so far, and we are always up to getting to know eachother better. At least he has a computer at home. June 2nd. Remember that date. That's when Enric and I started.

WHO HAS EVER MET THEIR BOYFRIEND, SPOUSE, WHATEVER ONLINE? I met Enric in person this past weekend! I like him sooooooo much! Favorite memories: the Pier (w/ No Trespassing!) the Gazeebo (by the pier with No Trespassing!) Busch Gardens Big Bear BK French Toast Sticks Dip n Dots Ice Cream makes my mouth numb! Damn Roommates! Carlos and Ashley Ashley and Me... in the pool... all wet... in the pool... lol "Taking a Nap" -- with no sleep. Pictures! Kisses and Hugs BIG Roller Coasters Bumper Cars Bolt.com Bolt staff erased my asking you out... :( "Off Topic" "I think I'm gonna stop smoking..." Right! lol Mac n Cheese Choco Milk n Gang movies FISHIES! Elephant... i sleep with him Decorative perfume
